title: If My Heart Had Wings Restoration Patch v1.0
description:
This is a Restoration Patch for If My Heart Had Wings (v1.0)
It restores ALL removed content in moenovel's release. Not just sex scenes.
Note that any original save files you had are not compatible after patching!

=======================================
Patch Installation: 

1. Unzip patch files into game installation directory.
2. Run apply_diffs.bat

=======================================

Project forums thread:  <a href="
http://forums.fuwanovel.org/index.php?/topic/1461-kono-oozora-h-scenes-porting-project/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://forums.fuwanovel.org/index.php?/topic/1461-kono-oozora-h-scenes-porting-project/</a>


Fuwanovel download page: <a href="
http://fuwanovel.org/novels/201" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://fuwanovel.org/novels/201</a>


Known issues
============
- Scene replay is not available.
- Tons of errors in first windmill hill scene Ã¢â‚¬â€ it means either its Japanese version instead English, or patch wasn't installed correctly.
- Honorifics usage is inconsistent Ã¢â‚¬â€ work in progress, will be fixed along with tlc of whole text.
- Several lines are clipped at bottom Ã¢â‚¬â€ they could be viewed via log.
- Several lines have missing quotes Ã¢â‚¬â€ work in progress.
